rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {AFF9130, BFF5913} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: This unit provides knowledge and skills in advanced topics in financial planning, such as: setting up and running a practice; ethics, professionalism and compliance; dealing with clients; managing client accounts; insurance and risk management; alternative assets; setting up and running a self-managed super fund; advanced estate planning, and behavioural finance.
